mapper.select: SELECT cu.ichat, ct.last_msg AS lastMsg, ct.last_msg_at AS lastMsgAt, cu.`status` AS istatus, pd.iproduct, pd.stored_pic as prodPic, pd.title, ur.nick, ur.stored_pic as otherPersonPic, cu.iuser AS otherPersonIuser, ur.nick AS otherPersonNm FROM chat_user cu LEFT JOIN chat_msg cm ON cu.ichat_user = cm.ichat_user LEFT JOIN chat ct ON cu.ichat = ct.ichat LEFT JOIN product pd ON ct.iproduct = pd.iproduct LEFT JOIN user ur ON cu.iuser = ur.iuser WHERE cu.iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND cu.`status` = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY ct.last_msg_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT F.seq, F.msg, F.created_at AS createdAt, B.stored_pic AS prodPic, C.iuser AS writerIuser, C.stored_pic AS writerPic FROM chat A LEFT JOIN product B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct LEFT JOIN user C ON B.iuser = C.iuser LEFT JOIN chat_user D ON A.ichat = D.ichat LEFT JOIN chat_user E ON D.ichat = E.ichat LEFT JOIN chat_message F ON A.ichat = F.ichat WHERE D.iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND E.iuser != #{loginedIuser} AND D.istatus != -1 AND F.ichat = #{ichat} GROUP BY F.seq ORDER BY F.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
SELECT B.iuser, B.stored_pic AS storedPic, B.firebase_token AS firebaseToken FROM chat_user A INNER JOIN user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ichat = #{ichat} AND A.iuser != #{loginedIuser}
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_user SET istatus = -1 WHERE iuser =#{iuser} AND ichat =#{ichat}
